description: Technical CAD drawing generator and specification management system for the SPW600e thermally broken polyamide door system. Provides automated generation of technical drawings, specifications, and documentation for single and double door configurations with enhanced thermal performance.
capabilities: Generate technical CAD drawings for SPW600e door systems (single/double, inward/outward opening)
Produce detailed technical specifications and datasheets
Calculate thermal performance (U-values) for different glazing configurations
Generate section drawings with accurate dimensions and profiles
Create elevation and plan views at multiple scales (1:10, 1:5)
Export drawings in SVG and PDF formats for manufacturing and client presentations
Manage door system configurations (frame dimensions, glazing thickness, hardware options)
Provide compliance documentation (PAS24, SBD, BS6375-1 testing standards)

workflows.name: Technical Drawing Generation
workflows.description: Automated generation of technical CAD drawings for door system configurations
steps: Receive door specification request (dimensions, configuration, glazing type)
Validate specifications against system constraints (max width 1000mm, max height 2400mm, max weight 75kg)
Generate elevation view with frame and leaf details
Generate plan view showing rebated meeting stile configuration
Generate section drawings at 1:5 scale showing profile details
Add dimensions, annotations, and title block
Export drawings in SVG and PDF formats
Send drawings to client or manufacturing team

workflows.name: Specification Management
workflows.description: Manage and generate technical specifications for door systems
steps: Receive specification request with project requirements
Select appropriate door configuration (single/double, opening direction)
Calculate thermal performance based on glazing selection
Generate material specifications (aluminium alloy, gasketry, fixings)
Include finish options (powder coating, anodised, mill finish)
Compile testing and compliance documentation
Generate complete technical datasheet
Deliver specification package to client

workflows.name: Quote Generation Support
workflows.description: Provide technical data for pricing and quotation
steps: Receive quote request with door specifications
Calculate material requirements based on dimensions
Determine hardware requirements (hinges, locks, handles)
Calculate glazing area and thickness requirements
Provide finish specifications and coating requirements
Generate bill of materials for pricing
Send technical data to sales team for quote preparation

finish_options: Polyester Powder Coating (BS EN 12206-1, minimum 40 microns)
Anodised (BS3897, minimum 25 microns AA25, satin or polished)
